Description: The following statement contains a magic number: try              {                  //GMapProvider.WebProxy = WebRequest.DefaultWebProxy;                  // or                  //GMapProvider.WebProxy = new WebProxy("127.0.0.1"' 1080);                  //GMapProvider.IsSocksProxy = true;                    GMaps.Instance.EnableTileHost(8844);                    BackgroundWorker w = sender as BackgroundWorker;                  while (!w.CancellationPending)                  {                      Thread.Sleep(1111);                  }                    GMaps.Instance.DisableTileHost();                  GMaps.Instance.CancelTileCaching();              }              catch (Exception ex)              {                  Debug.WriteLine("worker_DoWork: " + ex);              }
